Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 4: Dashboard UX - Build three-lane today view, topic trends, and sources admin

Implements the complete Phase 4 dashboard experience:

Web \(Frontend\):
- Added Drizzle schema for sources, items, item_topics, item_likes tables
- Created PGlite table definitions to sync from Electric
- Implemented data stores for items, sources, and topics with error handling
- Built scoring algorithm for ranking content \(recency + engagement + user preference\)
- Created ''Today'' page with three lanes \(Papers, Newsletters/Blogs, Social\)
- Built ''Topic Trends'' page with weekly aggregation and sparklines
- Built ''Sources'' admin page for managing ingestion sources
- Added Navigation component with route links
- Added ItemCard component for displaying content
- Created utility functions for formatting and excerpts

Backend \(Ingestor\):
- Fixed arXiv XML parsing by adding missing fields to Feed/Entry structs
- Added proper #[serde\(default\)] attributes for robust deserialization

All pages handle empty data gracefully and integrate with Electric sync.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix ElectricSQL integration: Use environment variable for remote URL and fix arxiv duplicate link field

- Update items.ts and papers.ts to use PUBLIC_ELECTRIC_URL env var instead of hardcoded localhost:3000
- Remove unused `link` field from Entry and Feed structs in arxiv.rs that was causing duplicate field parsing error
- This allows proper data syncing from remote ElectricSQL instance to PGlite in browser

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix UTF-8 char boundary panic in RSS feed truncation

Replace byte-index slicing \(&str[..N]\) with proper UTF-8 aware 
char-based truncation using .chars\(\).take\(N\) to handle multi-byte
characters in feed content. Fixes panic when processing RSS feeds
with smart quotes and other Unicode characters.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Configure ElectricSQL API secret and fix env loading

- Add PUBLIC_ELECTRIC_URL and PUBLIC_ELECTRIC_API_SECRET to web/.env.local
- Remove localhost:3000 fallback in items.ts to force explicit config
- Add auth token parameter to shape sync requests
- Fix error message for missing Electric URL

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement runtime config loader for Electric environment variables

- Create lib/config.ts with lazy-loaded Electric URL and secret getters
- Update items.ts to use getCachedElectricUrl/Secret at runtime instead of module load
- This avoids the import.meta.env loading issue by deferring to first use
- Fallback to window.__ELECTRIC_URL__ if import.meta.env unavailable

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
